CustomField.formula: IF (AND(LEN(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__c ) > 0, NOT(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c)) && NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM', HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus_Proposal__ProposalMakePrimary?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Button_MakePrimary", "Make Primary"),"_self"),IF(AND(LEN(Apttus_Proposal__Opportunity__c ) > 0, NOT(Apttus_Proposal__Primary__c)) && NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'PRM',HYPERLINK(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & "/apex/Apttus_Proposal__ProposalMakePrimary?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Button_MakePrimary", "Make Primary"),"_self"),NULL))
CustomField.label: Make Primary
